mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, rownum rnum FROM(SELECT * FROM notice_board ORDER BY bId ASC) A) WHERE rnum < 11
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board(bId, bName, bTitle, bContent) VALUES(notice_board_seq.nextVal, #{bName}, #{bTitle}, #{bContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_board SET bHit = bHit + 1 WHERE bId = #{bId}
